eventTopicList

java.lang.Object eventTopicList
This is a GServ plugin that listens to ALL (or configured) topics. Provides a path (usually log.html) that returns a page listing matching events. Provides filter where path = Config.url || '/log' Created by javaConductor on 2/5/14.
